page.title: 07Transport-Cookley Green Area
page.content: Most people in this area own cars or rely on friends/neighbours to drive them for shopping. As the area is sparsely populated the bus service is not good as it is uneconomical to run. The buses are run by a privately owned company subsidised by Oxfordshire C.C. This company also runs the school buses. A bus from Russells Water to Henley calls at Cookley Green at 9am on Tuesdays and Thursdays and returns by 1pm. The route from Watlington to Henley goes via Christmas Common on Tuesday Thursday Friday and Saturday. The bus leaves at 9.10am and returns by 12.30pm. There is an extra bus on Thursday afternoon. A route from Watlington to Reading gives four buses daily from Cookley Green except Wednesday when there are only three.
